name: Tokyo Love + (Respawn) The BIG demo!
description:
A BIG demo without the top down exploration of Tokyo city at this time...

Please visit the campaign of TOKYO LOVE+ RESPAWN on Kickstarter:

https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/957008919/tokyo-love-respawn

School life, love, jealousy, betrayals... And YANDARE! (different endings)

Yandare : Somebody who is sweet and kind at first glance. But when it comes to their love they will act obsessive and violent.

Tokyo love + is a Yandare and romantic visual novel for PC(Windows) scheduled for November 2020.  So be warning about the last chapter : It contains murder scenes that can be disturbing. Player discretion is advised especially at the end of the game. So don't let children play this game!

You will discover that some girls in the game are Yandare!

   Tokyo love + is the first visual novel which you can't win! When you reach the end of the game, the murdered characters will be different depending on the choices you have made during the game.  This abrupt end is required to continue with the story that I planned for Tokyo love + II.( I will start on it if Tokyo love + is a real success and if players are interested in a sequel).

   I may potentially bring the work to other consoles as well, given enough support and interest!

You are a young man named Akira Matsumoto who lives in Tokyo.

  All the school girls are in love with you!

  It's a story of jealousy, betrayal, deception and secrets where you have different choices.(The end can be changed depending on the choice you made)


3 languages:
